app_descript:
Rolling Sky

Brief: Rolling Sky is an exhilarating and pacey ball-control game that tests the limits of your speed and reaction time. With a blend of rhythm and precision, dive into various whimsical worlds each presenting distinct challenges that aim to keep you on the edge of your seat. Exuding dynamism through its splendid 3D effects, the game pushes you to harness your best maneuvering skills to conquer every round.
